div.p: Souchion, praktor of (the quarter of the) Bithynians, to Horion, son of Dioskoros, greetings. I receive from you eight silver drachmas for the poll-tax of the twentieth year of Hadrian Caesar the lord, total 8 dr., four bronze obols. Year 21 of Hadrian Caesar (the lord...). Translation: F. Micucci, CdE 95 (2020) 300
